This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2011 to 2015.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2006 to 2008.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2010 to 2011.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2010.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2009.
